title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 3X GTA$ and RP on Martin Madrazo Contact Missions
content:
Madrazo’s rolodex of dirty deeds never runs dry. Whether you’re storming a courthouse, tailing cartel defectors, or snatching witness lists, every Madrazo Contact Mission (including Madrazo Dispatch Services) pays out Triple Rewards this week.

Martin also wants targets eliminated daily and is calling on Bail Office owners to rise to the occasion. Complete Madrazo Hits for 2X GTA$ and RP, plus added payouts for using his weapon of choice and providing photographic evidence upon completion.
